Detailed Description

the tree structure, uses pointers

Parameters:
posx 
posy 
posz bottem left corner of box
width the width of the mesh
fbl child cell front bottom left,
fbr child cell front bottom right
ftl child cell front top left
ftr child cell front top right

bbr child cell back bottom right

btr child cell back top right
all particles in the cell

circ the total circulation (vector) of the cell
